summary: This is an email exchange from July 6, 2020, discussing logistics of an individual's departure from their role and coordination regarding Epstein trust-related matters. The correspondence indicates ongoing legal or administrative work concerning Epstein's trust after his death.

persons.name: John
persons.context: Mentioned alongside Ed as someone the email author hopes to speak with to sort out departure logistics.

events.title: Planned Departure Date
events.description: The email author states a tentative departure date is two weeks from July 6, 2020.

events.title: Call on Epstein Trust Matters
events.description: A call was scheduled for 1:15 PM to discuss Epstein trust-related matters.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from July 6, 2020, discussing administrative matters.
It references ongoing work or discussions related to 'Epstein trust-related matters', indicating posthumous legal or financial administration.
An individual is planning their departure from their role, with a tentative date of July 20, 2020.
The correspondence involves coordination with the Civil Division regarding the Epstein trust.
